ygData.subject: Re: Vlad
ygData.msgSnippet: Bah humbug. ... Havoc looks Vlad over, watching the bot growl and then straighten up. He glances at Vlad s pet as well before looking back at the bot. Vlad

Bah humbug.

::Havoc::

Havoc looks Vlad over, watching the bot growl and then straighten up. 
He glances at Vlad's pet as well before looking back at the bot. Vlad 
looked cunning, but inexperienced.

"This is the Alliance," Havoc answers Vlad's question, "My name is 
Havoc, what's yours?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> ( Carnage: Sorry for taking so long to reply with Vlad, Yanshosh. I 
have 
> been busy with Christmas business.)
> 
> ** Vlad's optics become accustome to the light which fintered in 
through the 
> open hatch-way, blinking a few last times before finally seeing the 
wall of 
> a hallway just beyond the door.
> This was a ship...some sort of base.
> But what he could tell, it wasn't Maximal, and was more close to 
the 
> Predacon build.
> Though, there was no way to find out for sure until he met whom 
ever this 
> ship belonged to, and maybe hire himself an assassin after all.
> Vlad smiled and chuckled deeply to himself. Von; if he was alive, 
would know 
> that his little brother came to give him a little visit.
> 
> He looks down at the animal at his side for a moment before he 
begins to 
> head for the door, jumping back in surprise as he nearly runs into 
someone. 
> Shesta growling at his side.
> It was the man who had dragged him from the sea, recovered the pod, 
and then 
> was taken away.
> Growling slighly as he saw the mans hand near his weapon, the growl 
> disappearing as he straightened himself up and cleared his throat.
> Turning out to look like a rather striking young man, what he 
wanted to look 
> like one.
> But Vlad nodded to Havoc's commant.**
> 
> " Yes. I don't like living in fish bowls for too long, get's 
stuffy."
> 
> ** Vlad didn't smile, only had an expression on his face which 
reflected the 
> brain within. Commented as clever by others. Sneaky and cruel by 
his 
> enemies.
> But it was time to get down to business.**
> 
> " What faction is this? "
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
